title: WD-40 Company outlines narrowed FY25 net sales growth range of 6%-9% amid record Q3 and gross margin recovery
excerpt: WD-40 Company reports record Q3 sales and improved margins, narrowing FY25 guidance and raising profitability targets.
text: Earnings Call Insights: WD-40 Company (WDFC) Q3 2025 Management View Steven A. Brass, CEO, reported "third quarter net sales of $156.9 million, a 1% increase compared to the same period last year" and highlighted this as "a record sales quarter for the company, reflecting continued progress and momentum." Earnings Call Insights: WD-40 Company (WDFC) Q3 2025

Management View

  • Steven A. Brass, CEO, reported "third quarter net sales of $156.9 million, a 1% increase compared to the same period last year" and highlighted this as "a record sales quarter for the company, reflecting continued progress and momentum." The CEO emphasized
